phrases: The prince should be with the princess.
Who was the one who decided that?
Lord, thank you for giving me this daily bread!
Thanks for showing me something nice!
Nanashima fell on top of you in P.E.
He really hit you hard, huh?
I mean, my eyes were glued to them.
5x7 was unfolding right in front of me.
Come on, if you are talking those two, it is got to be 7x5.
I get where you are coming from, though.
Did not you see who was hugging who?
I mean, they are tough servant and gentle prince-type characters, right?
A-chan, you just do not get it!
I am a second-year in high school.
I am a little... actually, it is pretty obvious!
I am what you would call a fujoshi.
I love seeing hot guys get along more than anything!
As my chest heats up from watching the passionate bonds between two guys, I pair them!
They do not even need a real connection.
My imagination is more than enough to pair them!
Any chance I get, I pair them!
This is my way of life!
And so, my classmates are no exception.
Nanashima really looks like Shion from Mirage Saga, does not he?
Oh, in that bad boy sorta way, right?
If you are feeling better, would you kindly free up the bed?
Another student's here who is not feeling well.
It is fine, it is fine.
That is Shinomiya-kun from first year.
We are both on the health committee.
Oh, so that is how he knew you.
He is pretty harsh for such a pretty boy.
But, does not that make it better?
The snootier a pretty boy is, the yummier he is, am I right?
The colder he acts, the hotter he gets!
I kind of had an accident during P.E.
You know, Kae-chan, you seem to have a weird connection with hot guys.
Maybe I should join the history club, too.
But, I do not know if I have a connection, per se.
You really went flying back there.
It is your fault, you know.
I came out unscathed, thanks to you, the human cushion!
I am glad I was useful!
In any case, we are sorry.
Was that supposed to be an apology?
Jeez, the only good thing about Nanashima is his looks.
Do not let it bother you, Kae-chan.
Igarashi apologized even though Nanashima was the one who did it.
Okay, maybe let it bother you a little, Kae-chan.
Even if I have a connection with hot guys, it is wasted on me.
A prince should be with a prince.
My happiness comes from peeping on the sidelines, not bothering them.
Shion plays a big part in Mirage Saga today, right?
I am so looking forward to Shion!
Sorry if I spoil it on social media.
We reached out to the sky.
Phone: Ekka@*** Gyaaahh! (q) So cuuute! (q) Ekka@***
I feel like today's story's going to be big!
Who is going to make Enchanito?
She is been absent for a week already.
I cannot reach her, and her tweets have stopped, too.
Stop shutting yourself in like this and come out.
Are not you worried about your little sister?
Get your ass out of bed!
You will die if you keep at this, fatty!
Do not give me that crap!
Stop being a headache for mom!
I am going to take a bath.
I guess I will tell A-chan what happened.
What kind of poster is this?
So it really is you, Kae!
This is reality, so there is nothing I can do.
Oh, no, everyone is staring at me.
I did force it to fit.
Sorry I have not been in touch!
She got cute after losing some weight.
She is a real hottie, now!
But do not forget what she used to be.
Jeez, what are you going to do now?
When I see Nanashima-kun, I start to remember Shion!
Right, you fell, so you should go to the infirmary.
I saved a cat that was stuck in a tree.
I guess I changed so much that he did not recognize me.
I suppose you have gotten a little thinner,
but it is easy to tell who you are.
You are the only one who knew it was me right away.
Serinuma-san, would you like to see a movie with me next Sunday?
I am the one that is
Serinuma-senpai, may I talk to you for a minute?
I wanted to talk to you.
Cute, but hot pants on a date is a no.
You are the one who asked me to lend you some clothes!
You really think this is a date?
I am talking to Serinuma-san here.
Quick to make the first move, as always.
I wanted to apologize for my rude behavior earlier.
I was wondering if I could borrow the next part of the book you lent me.
I cannot hear with you all talking at once!
I was asking if you wanted to go to a movie with me on Sunday.
I-I was going to ask the same thing!
So, I have somehow ended up going with all of them.
What is this, an otome game?
How did all of this happen all of a sudden, anyway?!
C'mon, who can leave a cute chick like you alone?
Hmm, it is kind of tight around my breasts.
But, I do not know how to do any of that sorta stuff.
A scar created by a man can only be healed by another man.
Get fired up for a new genre: the boyfriend!
A-chan, does your boyfriend know you are an otaku?
He does not have a clue.
If he knew, it would be over.
That is right, you would best keep that under wraps.
I cannot let them find out.
It is just for one day.
I want to watch them like this forever.
Oh, do not worry about it.
It was pretty good, was not it?
I was so busy watching those two, I do not remember a thing.
Is not your runny nose giving you a hard time, though?
A senpai who cleverly handles his stubborn kohai.
I-I am going to use the bathroom real quick!
Just come here for a sec.
If we cannot be alone, let me have you to myself for just a little bit.
I know exactly what is on your mind!
Was not I just all flustered over a guy like some normal girl?!
What the heck is wrong with me?!
I do not think I can do this!
I would like an SLT burger meal.
Captain Teke Teke Full Heart Set. I want it.
I will have black tea and apple pie!
I have got to ride this out!
Teach me the words that say more than I love you because I want your heart!
I want to sing Shion's character song.
What are you going to sing?
I want to sing so badly I am shaking.
Nothing good will come of them finding out I am an otaku!
I am not going to let my faults show!
I am having a lot of fun.
Should we go to a cafe and rest?
But, maybe it is about time I headed home.
This store only, just for today!
It is the last shipment from the manufacturing warehouse!
If it is a product limited to Anime Ito only, then...
Could it be that ever-so-rare product that sold out in under 10 minutes?!
I want to go make sure!
And if I am lucky, buy it!
I have kept it together until now.
Just a little more and this will all be over!
I am sorry I disappeared so suddenly like that.
But I know if I let this chance slip away...
I would regret it for the rest of my life!
You all asked me out today, and I did my best to enjoy the date like a normal person,
but I guess I could not.
I was trying so hard not to show my flaws that I did not enjoy myself.
But, I just cannot lie to myself.
Sorry, but I am not following you.
Is not it a good thing to have something you like?
your eyes are sparkling right now.
I much prefer you like this.
This is way better than the dead eyes you had before.
I have seen anime before, too.
Next, let us go somewhere you want.
Okay, I want to check out the new product line.
Let us head back to Anime Ito!
Oh, and look at what I got.
Why did you even go on a date, Kae-chan?
Have you ever fallen for anyone?
I guess a girl with a good head on her shoulders.
Do not you want a girl that is your age or younger?
Nah, I do not really like loud, childish girls.
I cannot deal with boisterous girls.
Is not it hard to talk to someone who is so tame, though?
I go for girls that are upbeat and bright!

On a date, we would go to an amusement park or pool!
